LanguageData.SZMechNeko_GammaRailGun.label: gamma rail gun
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_GammaRailGun.description: A ranged weapon equipped by mechnekos.
LanguageData.Bullet_SZMechNeko_XiPistol.label: xi pistol bullet
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_XiPistol.label: xi pistol
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_XiPistol.description: The mechneko type-xi is equipped with a small laser weapon. Its laser can easily ignite the target.

LanguageData.Bullet_SZMechNeko_OmegaA.label: high-explosive shell
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_OmegaA.label: mega max rail gun
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_OmegaA.description: The mechneko type - Over-the-horizon mortars carried by the Omega. The weapon uses an extended magazine, so ammo capacity is very limited.
